articles.description: Aston Villa fell short against PSG - but Unai Emery's side showed they now belong in this elite company, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Aston Villa 3-2 PSG: Unai Emery's side showed they belong in Champions League

articles.description: From injury-hit journeyman to Champions League goal machine - BBC Sport charts the rise of Borussia Dortmund striker Serhou Guirassy.
articles.title: Serhou Guirassy: Borussia Dortmund striker's rise from journeyman to top scorer

articles.description: Ruben Amorim will either recall or drop goalkeeper Andre Onana for Man Utd's Europa League quarter-final second leg against Lyon - and it's a big call for several reasons.
articles.title: Andre Onana: Why Ruben Amorim's next decision on Man Utd goalkeeper issue is so big

articles.description: British number four Harriet Dart asks the umpire to tell her opponent to put on deodorant during her first-round loss at the Rouen Open.
articles.title: Harriet Dart: Briton makes deodorant comment about opponent Lois Boisson in Rouen Open defeat

articles.description: Jude Bellingham believes the second leg of their Champions League quarter-final against Arsenal on Wednesday is "a night made for Real Madrid".
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: Arsenal Champions League second leg 'a night made for Real Madrid'

articles.description: Punjab Kings set an Indian Premier League record for the lowest total successfully defended as they beat Kolkata Knight Riders by 16 runs.
articles.title: IPL 2025 results: PBKS set record as they successfully defend 111 against KKR

articles.description: Marcus Rashford produces arguably his best display as Aston Villa come close to completing a stunning comeback against Paris St-Germain.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery praises 'fantastic' forward

articles.description: Two-time Olympic breaststroke champion Adam Peaty says he is motivated to continue in the sport to the next Olympics by the message it sends to his son.
articles.title: Adam Peaty: Swimmer says he is motivated to continue to LA 2028 by the message it sends his son

articles.description: The Champions League is back this week with two English clubs among the eight teams that have reached the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Champions League quarter-finals: preview, fixtures & route to the final

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Aston Villa vs PSG in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Aston Villa 3-2 PSG (4-5 on aggregate): Roaring Villa comeback falls just short in Champions League
